abstract: Once winter arrives in full force, Turks start to take refuge in seasonal drinks like sweet sahlep, or hearty boza, to help them fortify against the elements. A tasting tour of various restaurants and cafes provides a warm way to explore Istanbul and its culinary traditions.
lead_paragraph: Once winter arrives in full force, with wind whipping down the Bosporus from the Black Sea, and the snow flurries gathering atop minarets, Turks start to take refuge in seasonal drinks like sweet sahlep, or hearty boza,  to help them fortify against the elements.

headline.main: Seasonal Drinks to Warm Up Winter in Istanbul
